/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. On either side of the street, there are red brick buildings, their vibrant color contrasting beautifully with the greenery. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
